title: I want to change league client to korean but it's not working
body: I want to change league client to korean but it's not working

replies.body: Each region has their own supported languages, and does not currently accept others outside of that.  Per the [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide, only English is currently supported on NA.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UwpkpbI4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-30T00:00:55.732+0000)
>
> Each region has their own supported languages, and does not currently accept others outside of that.  Per the [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide, only English is currently supported on NA.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I got a Question: Why is this a thing ? I mean i live in germany but i speak Korean so i would like to play it in Korean. Why dont you just accept every language in every region, so everyone can just choose what fits for them ? I honestly need an explanation for this currently not so "well handled" situation.

LG{{summoner:4}}
